pull.title: Fix InvalidateBlock
pull.body: There was a bug in InvalidateBlock that prevented setBlockIndexCandidates from being properly repopulated. This would prevent you from necessarily ending up on the best chain after calling invalidateblock.  I also added an RPC test.

events.body:
Code review ACK.

Copyright at the top of the new file should have year 2015, if you care about that sort of thing (I don't....)
Rebased to pick up #5883 so hopefully Travis will pass  now.
